data.text: —The last bit of info I can give you... It looks like there will be a Great Escape runner in your race. She'll increase the tempo of the whole race, so be prepared!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: —The last bit of info I can give you... It looks like there will be a Great Escape runner in your race. She'll increase the tempo of the whole race, so be prepared!

data.text:
Thanks so much, Transcend! 
I'm finally starting to get an idea of what I can do 
to win my next race!
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Thanks so much, Transcend! 
<story>I'm finally starting to get an idea of what I can do 
<story>to win my next race!

data.text:
No need to thank me, it's what I do. 
Now, let's see your payment.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>No need to thank me, it's what I do. 
<story>Now, let's see your payment.

data.text:
Sure! 
You wanted info about your Trainer, right?
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Sure! 
<story>You wanted info about your Trainer, right?

data.text: I saw them sitting on the sofa in the boarding house. I heard them complain to another trainer. I think it was something like "Ugh! My work never ends!"
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed: I saw them sitting on the sofa in the boarding house. I heard them complain to another trainer. I think it was something like "Ugh! My work never ends!"

data.text:
Is that... enough info for you? 
It's obviously not even close to as valuable 
as the info you gave me...
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Is that... enough info for you? 
<story>It's obviously not even close to as valuable 
<story>as the info you gave me...

data.text:
No, no. It's plenty! 
Thanks a bunch!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>No, no. It's plenty! 
<story>Thanks a bunch!

data.text: ...That's exactly what I needed.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>...That's exactly what I needed.

data.text:
Even if there may not be training right now, all the other 
work hasn't gone away. Just as I opened my laptop, 
Transcend showed up.
data.processed:
<story>Even if there may not be training right now, all the other 
<story>work hasn't gone away. Just as I opened my laptop, 
<story>Transcend showed up.

data.text:
Oh, there you are, Tray-chan. 
Whatcha you up to?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh, there you are, Tray-chan. 
<story>Whatcha you up to?

data.text:
She startled me and I quickly shut my laptop. 
I don't want her to worry about me, so I've been 
hiding the fact that I'm still working.
data.processed:
<story>She startled me and I quickly shut my laptop. 
<story>I don't want her to worry about me, so I've been 
<story>hiding the fact that I'm still working.

data.text:
Hmm, hmm. 
I see, I see.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, hmm. 
<story>I see, I see.

data.text:
How about this, Tray-chan: 
Let's go to the festival together. I mean, 
you're free too, right?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>How about this, Tray-chan: 
<story>Let's go to the festival together. I mean, 
<story>you're free too, right?

data.text:
Wowie, it sure is crowded! 
The atmosphere's pretty nice.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Wowie, it sure is crowded! 
<story>The atmosphere's pretty nice.

data.text:
Hmm hmm hmm♪ Hehe, I haven't been to a festival 
in forever. Should I have worn a yukata, I wonder...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm hmm hmm♪ Hehe, I haven't been to a festival 
<story>in forever. Should I have worn a yukata, I wonder...

data.text:
... Honestly, I still have work to do, but I couldn't just 
decline her. She's looking around the different stalls, 
seemingly happier than ever.
data.processed:
<story>... Honestly, I still have work to do, but I couldn't just 
<story>decline her. She's looking around the different stalls, 
<story>seemingly happier than ever.

data.text: Sounds good. How about yakisoba? It's the cliché festival food, after all.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Sounds good. How about yakisoba? It's the cliché festival food, after all.

data.text:
Whoa, it's so good! Want some? 
You can use my chopsticks.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Whoa, it's so good! Want some? 
<story>You can use my chopsticks.

data.text:
Hmm? You're concerned about that? 
Come now, we're close friends. Haha.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? You're concerned about that? 
<story>Come now, we're close friends. Haha.

data.text:
Actually, I wasn't sure you liked yakisoba. 
I'd assumed you did.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Actually, I wasn't sure you liked yakisoba. 
<story>I'd assumed you did.

data.text:
Aha, I knew it. 
Let's go somewhere else..!
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: Why ask that, if you knew...?
Why ask that, if you knew...?

data.processed:
<story>Aha, I knew it. 
<story>Let's go somewhere else..!

data.text:
Whoa! That's some massive cotton candy! 
That wasn't in my info..!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Whoa! That's some massive cotton candy! 
<story>That wasn't in my info..!

data.text:
Hey Tray-chan, want to make one 
at one of those spinning machines?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hey Tray-chan, want to make one 
<story>at one of those spinning machines?

data.text:
Hehe. You're not giving me the chance 
to try food that you made by hand?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hehe. You're not giving me the chance 
<story>to try food that you made by hand?

data.text:
Actually... Do you have what it takes to make 
cotton candy? Show me your skill!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Actually... Do you have what it takes to make 
<story>cotton candy? Show me your skill!

data.text:
Oh, there's even a shooting gallery! 
Why don't you give it a go?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: Sure, but my aim isn't very...

data.processed:
<story>Oh, there's even a shooting gallery! 
<story>Why don't you give it a go?

data.text: Worry not! You've got me by your side, remember?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Worry not! You've got me by your side, remember?

data.text:
I happen to know there's a little trick to this. 
Don't aim for the very middle of the prize, 
but slightly to the left.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I happen to know there's a little trick to this. 
<story>Don't aim for the very middle of the prize, 
<story>but slightly to the left.

data.text:
Ah, wait. Your aim is shaking. 
Calm down. Relax while you look through the sight.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ah, wait. Your aim is shaking. 
<story>Calm down. Relax while you look through the sight.

data.text:
Wow! Bull's eye! 
Your aim's more steady than I thought!
data.name: Man at the Shooting Gallery
data.processed:
<story>Wow! Bull's eye! 
<story>Your aim's more steady than I thought!

data.text: Hee hee. Got you excited, right?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Hee hee. Got you excited, right?

data.text:
Really though, you're super patient. 
Hmm hmm.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Really though, you're super patient. 
<story>Hmm hmm.

data.text:
After that, Transcend took me out of the hustle and bustle 
of the festival. She led me to a shrine some distance away.
data.processed:
<story>After that, Transcend took me out of the hustle and bustle 
<story>of the festival. She led me to a shrine some distance away.

data.text:
This is the place. 
There's a wide view over the city, so we can 
see the fireworks really well. Or so I read.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>This is the place. 
<story>There's a wide view over the city, so we can 
<story>see the fireworks really well. Or so I read.

data.text:
There's still some time left though... 
I guess we can relax a bit while waiting.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>There's still some time left though... 
<story>I guess we can relax a bit while waiting.

choices.text: Thanks for taking me somewhere relaxing.

data.text:
Hmm? 
Um... You're welcome?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? 
<story>Um... You're welcome?

data.text:
To be honest, I'm pretty sure she took me to the festival 
because she figured out that I'm getting overworked...
data.processed:
<story>To be honest, I'm pretty sure she took me to the festival 
<story>because she figured out that I'm getting overworked...

data.text: I thank her for being so incredibly considerate to me.
data.processed: <story>I thank her for being so incredibly considerate to me.

data.text: Well... You shouldn't really thank me for that.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Well... You shouldn't really thank me for that.

data.text:
Well... 
Because...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Well... 
<story>Because...

data.text:
I just wanted to have some fun, together with you. 
That's all.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I just wanted to have some fun, together with you. 
<story>That's all.

data.text:
And giving you a break was just an added bonus. 
As a way to disguise what I really wanted to do... 
It wasn't really for that purpose.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>And giving you a break was just an added bonus. 
<story>As a way to disguise what I really wanted to do... 
<story>It wasn't really for that purpose.

data.text:
But, surely you had some fun at least? 
Haha.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But, surely you had some fun at least? 
<story>Haha.

data.text:
She wants to have fun, first and foremost. 
And she was able to help me out in the process.
data.processed:
<story>She wants to have fun, first and foremost. 
<story>And she was able to help me out in the process.

data.text: I realized, when we went to the cinema together... That I don't have enough information about you.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: I realized, when we went to the cinema together... That I don't have enough information about you.

data.text:
I wanted to know more about you. Everything. 
Just the thought got me so excited!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I wanted to know more about you. Everything. 
<story>Just the thought got me so excited!

data.text:
I told you before, right? 
When you became my Trainer.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I told you before, right? 
<story>When you became my Trainer.

data.text: I'll start with some advice. If you want to succeed in scouting her, she's gonna need some info about you, Tray-chan.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: I'll start with some advice. If you want to succeed in scouting her, she's gonna need some info about you, Tray-chan.

data.text:
Except... What you told me that day wasn't even close 
to enough..! I needed more time to get to know it all.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Except... What you told me that day wasn't even close 
<story>to enough..! I needed more time to get to know it all.

data.text:
So... How about tonight, 
you tell me everything about yourself?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>So... How about tonight, 
<story>you tell me everything about yourself?

data.text:
Your likes, dislikes, things like that. 
Fill me in on all the missing pieces.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Your likes, dislikes, things like that. 
<story>Fill me in on all the missing pieces.

data.text: I want to know you better.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I want to know you better.

data.text: Honestly, though... I don't really get what about me she's interested in. I'm a normal human, unlike her.
data.processed: Honestly, though... I don't really get what about me she's interested in. I'm a normal human, unlike her.

data.text:
Yet, she gives me this insisting look. Okay then... 
As her Trainer, I can't let her down.

choices.text: Is it OK if I don't have any interesting info?
choices.processed: <size=38>Is it OK if I don't have any interesting info?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Yet, she gives me this insisting look. Okay then... 
<story>As her Trainer, I can't let her down.

data.text: Of course! In fact, I'm sure it's still interesting to me anyway.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Of course! In fact, I'm sure it's still interesting to me anyway.

data.text:
I could stay up the entire night, so long as you keep talking. 
And not just tonight, but from here on out.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I could stay up the entire night, so long as you keep talking. 
<story>And not just tonight, but from here on out.

data.text: Fill me in on everything, Tray-chan!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Fill me in on everything, Tray-chan!
